Triangulate.h

00001 
00002 // ** THIS IS A CODE SNIPPET WHICH WILL EFFICIEINTLY TRIANGULATE ANY
00003 // ** POLYGON/CONTOUR (without holes) AS A STATIC CLASS.  THE TRIANGULATE
00004 // ** BASE CLASS ALSO PROVIDES TWO USEFUL HELPER METHODS, ONE WHICH
00005 // ** COMPUTES THE AREA OF A POLYGON, AND ANOTHER WHICH DOES AN EFFICENT
00006 // ** POINT IN A TRIANGLE TEST.
00007 // ** SUBMITTED BY JOHN W. RATCLIFF (jratcliff@verant.com) July 22, 2000
00008 
00009 #ifndef TRIANGULATE_H
00010 #define TRIANGULATE_H
00011 
00012 /****************************************************************/
00013 /* Static class to triangulate any contour/polygon efficiently **/
00014 /* Does not support polygons with holes.                       **/
00015 /* This code snippet was submitted to FlipCode.com by          **/
00016 /* John W. Ratcliff (jratcliff@verant.com) on July 22, 2000    **/
00017 /* I did not write the original code/algorithm for this        **/
00018 /* this triangulator, in fact, I can't even remember where I   **/
00019 /* found it in the first place.  However, I did rework it into **/
00020 /* the following black-box static class so you can make easy   **/
00021 /* use of it in your own code.                                 **/
00022 /****************************************************************/
00023 
00024 
00025 #include "MathTypes.h"
00026 
00027 class Triangulate_f
00028 {
00029 public:
00030     // triangulate a contour/polygon, places results in STL vector
00031     // as series of triangles.
00032     static bool Process(const FLine2 &contour, FLine2 &result);
00033 
00034     // compute area of a contour/polygon
00035     static float Area(const FLine2 &contour);
00036 
00037     // decide if point Px/Py is inside triangle defined by
00038     // (Ax,Ay) (Bx,By) (Cx,Cy)
00039     static bool InsideTriangle(float Ax, float Ay,
00040                                float Bx, float By,
00041                                float Cx, float Cy,
00042                                float Px, float Py);
00043 
00044 private:
00045     static bool Snip(const FLine2 &contour,int u,int v,int w,int n,int *V);
00046 };
00047 
00048 class Triangulate_d
00049 {
00050 public:
00051     // triangulate a contour/polygon, places results in STL vector
00052     // as series of triangles.
00053     static bool Process(const DLine2 &contour, DLine2 &result);
00054 
00055     // compute area of a contour/polygon
00056     static double Area(const DLine2 &contour);
00057 
00058     // decide if point Px/Py is inside triangle defined by
00059     // (Ax,Ay) (Bx,By) (Cx,Cy)
00060     static bool InsideTriangle(double Ax, double Ay,
00061                                double Bx, double By,
00062                                double Cx, double Cy,
00063                                double Px, double Py);
00064 
00065 private:
00066     static bool Snip(const DLine2 &contour,int u,int v,int w,int n,int *V);
00067 };
00068 
00069 #endif
